text: Lana Wachowski (born June 21, 1965, birth name Laurence Wachowski) and Lilly Wachowski (born December 29, 1967, birth name Andrew Paul Wachowski), known together professionally as The Wachowskis, currently as The Wachowski Sisters (since 2016), and formerly as The Wachowski Brothers (before 2010), are Polish American movie directors, writers and transgender women, most famous for creating The Matrix series. Their other projects include live-action adaptation of Speed Racer, Jupiter Ascending and the Netflix television series Sense8. Lana Wachowski had a sex change operation in 2008 and changed her name from Larry Wachowski. Lilly changed her name from Andy Wachowski in 2016. == Filmography == * Assassins (1995) (story, screenplay credits, as The Wachowski Brothers) * Bound (1996) (written and directed, executive producers, as The Wachowski Brothers) * The Matrix (1999) (written and directed, executive producers, as The Wachowski Brothers) * The Matrix Reloaded (2003) (written and directed, executive producers, as The Wachowski Brothers) * The Matrix Revolutions (2003) (written and directed, executive producers, as The Wachowski Brothers) * The Animatrix (2003) (producers, wrote four of the nine animated shorts, as The Wachowski Brothers) * V for Vendetta (2006) (produced and written, based on the graphic novel by Alan Moore and David Lloyd, as The Wachowski Brothers) * The Invasion (2007) (rewritten various parts and added a twist ending, uncredited, as The Wachowski Brothers) * Speed Racer (2008) (produced, written and directed, based on the Speed Racer anime, as The Wachowski Brothers) * Ninja Assassin (2009) (producers, as The Wachowski Brothers) * Cloud Atlas (2012) (written and directed, executive producers) * Jupiter Ascending (2015) (written and directed, executive producers) * Sense8 (2015) (directed) == References == == Other websites == * * Category:1960s births Category:Living people Category:Sibling duos Category:Movie directors from Chicago Category:Movie producers from Chicago Category:Screenwriters from Illinois Category:Transgender women
title: The Wachowskis
